about.short: Asphalt 8: Airborne is an arcade racing game with gravity-defying stunts, over 300 vehicles, and high-speed aerial action.
about.full: Asphalt 8: Airborne, developed by Gameloft Barcelona, features intense high-speed arcade racing across exotic tracks with jumps, barrel rolls, and 360° stunts. Players choose from hundreds of licensed cars and motorcycles, upgrade their rides, and compete in solo career or multiplayer events. The game supports cross-play on mobile and PC, and regularly receives seasonal updates and new content. With a dynamic physics engine, multiple control schemes, and deep customization, Asphalt 8 delivers an adrenaline-fueled racing experience.
